issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Unable to update data in cloud because original admin was deleted.
Reported this last year, any changes or do I have to start a new project, export data into another database and re-populate?
fields.summary: Unable to update data in cloud because original admin was deleted

comments.body:
Hello Keylo!

Hey, we will need more information on this. 

- Original admin user.
- Which was your cloud id app?
- Do you have a written release of the previous admin? 

Please don't put this info here, since it will become public. Drop me a line to mpmiranda@appcelerator.com so we can contact the Cloud team about this. 

Best,

Mauro

Hello,
Customer is not replying, and this is not an actual bug. 

I provided the customer with an option to contact us and help on this. 

Best,

Mauro
